pullRequest.title: [BEAM-11075] Fix go sdk gbk load test
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes to fix Go SDK GBK Load test case.

Skip GBK 7 test for now because it runs out of memory
Fix typings in num_records for GBK_2, GBK_5, GBK_6


Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message: fix go sdk gbk load test case

nodes.bodyText: You should explain why do you want to skip that test. I think one or two sentences describing the memory issue that you observed is fine. You could also add a TODO and attach it to this JIRA ticket: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9761 which tracks problems with GBK and CoGBK for Python (the issue can be possibly related)
nodes.diffHunk:

 String now = new Date().format('MMddHHmmss', TimeZone.getTimeZone('UTC'))
 
+def TESTS_TO_SKIP = [
